identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Swiss Utility' dashboard that is dense, authoritative, and highly functional, avoiding generic SaaS aesthetics.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Poster boldness with Bloomberg Terminal density.
Content is King: Data is the hero. Chrome is minimal.
Contrast: High contrast for readability in bright offices/outdoors.
Zoom In: Focus on athlete metrics and video evidence.

heading.usage: Page titles, KPI values, Modal headers. Tight tracking.

mono.usage: IDs, timestamps, raw metrics, tabular data.

rules: Overlines must be uppercase, text-xs, tracking-widest.

usage_rules: Use 'Signal Colors' (Red/Orange/Blue) only for status and actions.
Backgrounds should be stark white or very light grey. No muddy mid-tones.

strategies: Dashboard: Dense grid. Widgets stretch to fill height.
List View: Full-width tables with sticky headers.
Profile: Bento grid. Hero stats (top left), Video (top right), Timeline (bottom).

cards.classes: bg-white border border-border shadow-sm rounded-none md:rounded-sm

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-sm font-medium px-6 py-2
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-border text-primary hover:bg-surface rounded-sm font-medium px-6 py-2

inputs.classes: bg-white border-border rounded-sm focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary focus:border-primary font-sans

tables.header: bg-surface text-xs uppercase tracking-wider font-semibold text-text_secondary h-10

badges.classes: text-xs font-medium px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full border

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise on sidebar backgrounds to reduce sterility.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'Tracing Beam' effect on active cards or selected table rows.

motion.micro_interactions: Buttons scale down slightly (0.98) on click. Table rows highlight instantly.
motion.loading: Skeleton loaders with shimmering effect (no spinners for layout loading).

placeholders.map: Use a stylized SVG map of India.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Control Room' grid for the main dashboard.
Use 'Chivo' for all major headings and 'JetBrains Mono' for data points.
Ensure the 'Query Builder' modal is spacious and uses clear logic connectors.
Optimize for density: Avoid excessive padding inside data tables.
Use the provided image URLs for dummy data in the candidate list and profiles.
Strictly follow the color palette. Do not introduce new colors without reason.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts or default Tailwind blues.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through z-index and subtle borders, not heavy shadows.
Every interaction needs a micro-state (hover, active, focus).
Use 2-3x more spacing between SECTIONS, but tight spacing within DATA components.
